amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Energy to submit a biennial report to Congress on the equal employment opportunity practices at Department of Energy National laboratories.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 108-69 to require the Energy Department to report to Congress on a biennial basis on the equal employment opportunity practices at the Energy Department's National Laboratories.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
